params._generation: Generation of priority pool (1 if no liquidations occurred)

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be registered
params._generation: Generation of priority pool (1 if no liquidations occurred)
params._ratio: Current ratio payout has been registered at

newPayout(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Registers new Payout in Payout Pool

userdoc.notice: Payout Pool         Every time there is a report passed, some assets will be moved to this pool         It is stored as a Payout struct         - amount       Total amount of this payout         - remaining    Remaining amount         - endTimestamp After this timestamp, no more claims         - ratio        Max ratio of a user's crToken
